summary: The "Cheaper by the Dozen" crew is back, sans Clifton Webb. Lillian is struggling to make ends meet without her husband's income, while Anne, Martha, and even Ernestine find romance.
cast: Jeanne Crain|Myrna Loy|Debra Paget|Jeffrey Hunter|Edward Arnold|Hoagy Carmichael|Barbara Bates|Robert Arthur|Verna Felton|Robert Adler|Merry Anders|Charlotte Austin|David Bair|Benny Bartlett|Willis Bouchey|Boyd Cabeen|Teddy Driver|Robert Easton|William Forrest|Everett Glass|A. Cameron Grant|June Hedin|Mary Alan Hokanson|Jimmy Hunt|Tommy Ivo|Lori Lanegger|Jack Larson|Roddy McCaskill|Martin Milner|Carol Nugent|Maudie Prickett|Clay Randolph|Dick Rich|Michael Ross|Syd Saylor|Mario Siletti|Anthony Sydes|Al Thompson|Tina Thompson|Clifton Webb|Cecil Weston
keywords: female engineer|working single mother|widow|told in flashback|social dance
title: Bellezas por casar
